messages.body:
OK honesty compels -- we were not sent the original e-mail which sparked this exchange. However, we think it was the following, used by many Lads (search on "Toshio Kuzito"). As usual, remember that the Lads borrow names willy nilly and TK may be or have been a real person, who knows nothing about this and deserves no grief.

Dear Sir/Madam ,

I am making this contact with you in good faith. I got your
email address from the Foreign Department in our Ministry
of Foreign Affairs Office. I am working with the Standard
Trust Bank Limited, Apapa  Branch Lagos. My purpose of
writing you is to ask for your assistance  to provide your
bank account where we can successfully secure the  sum of
 $10.5 million (ten million five hundred thousand united
states  dollars). For your information, there is one
Japanese business merchant based  here in Nigeria and his
name is Mr. Toshio Kuzito. He was the owner of  kuzito
fisheries Nig. Ltd, located at No.125 industrial zone,
Oshodi expressway, Isolo here in Lagos now have been taken
 over by Government  of Nigeria because nobody came for
this company after the death of Mr. Toshio.This man died in
a plane crash in 2002 together with his wife here in
Nigeria. He was ! banking with my bank and I m his
accounting officer. However, since the death of Mr. Toshio,
I have been trying to contact  any of his relative in the
city of Osaka, his home country Japan through his address
with me, to let his people know about his money  in our
bank but I did not receive any response. I later remembered
 that Mr. Toshio came to my country out of shame he was
receiving  from his country because he was impotent. This
secret he revealed  to me when he was  alive because I
pestered him to introduce his  children to me. Now I have
decided to link anybody to stand as Mr.  Toshio next of kin
in order to claim the money he deposited here  as Fixed
Solid Investment since nobody knew about it. Government of
my country will pay it to Federal Reserve if I should
declare to them about this fund. Note that there is no risk
involved in this transaction, as I will give you all
information you may need about Mr. Toshio and his banking
relationship with my branch to enable you stand as his next
of kin  to receive this money in you'r account. This
transaction will go  through normal banking process only
that you have to stand firm  as the next of kin to Mr.
Toshio just to claim this money. I will  direct you on how
to apply for the claims of this money. Please  if you are
interested and capable to carry out this deal with me,
contact me through my email address  or . I will require the following
information from you for procession of the fund in your
favour.

1. Your private phone and fax number
2. Your account information where this fund will be paid
into.
3. Your home address. I personally need your home address
because I do not know you too well before now only that I
decided to work with you on trust believing God that you
will not cheat on me.! Note that we can conclude this
transaction within 2 weeks upon your compliance in applying
for the claims to our Head Office, as I will  direct you. I
will give you 25 percent after we conclude this
transaction.  Be duly informed that I will be resigning
from this banking work  to come over to your country after
the transfer of this fund to  your account. I will then
engage myself in international business  since I will have
enough money for any kind of business after this
 transaction. You need not to be afraid because in as much
as I would  want my reputation protected, I would also want
yours to also be protected.  I 'm waiting for your urgent
response.

Best regards,
messages.raw:
DAVID ADAMS

OK honesty compels -- we were not sent the original e-mail which sparked this exchange. However, we think it was the following, used by many Lads (search on "Toshio Kuzito"). As usual, remember that the Lads borrow names willy nilly and TK may be or have been a real person, who knows nothing about this and deserves no grief.

Dear Sir/Madam ,

I am making this contact with you in good faith. I got your email address from the Foreign Department in our Ministry of Foreign Affairs Office. I am working with the Standard Trust Bank Limited, Apapa Branch Lagos. My purpose of writing you is to ask for your assistance to provide your bank account where we can successfully secure the sum of $10.5 million (ten million five hundred thousand united states dollars). For your information, there is one Japanese business merchant based here in Nigeria and his name is Mr. Toshio Kuzito. He was the owner of kuzito fisheries Nig. Ltd, located at No.125 industrial zone, Oshodi expressway, Isolo here in Lagos now have been taken over by Government of Nigeria because nobody came for this company after the death of Mr. Toshio.This man died in a plane crash in 2002 together with his wife here in Nigeria. He was ! banking with my bank and I m his accounting officer. However, since the death of Mr. Toshio, I have been trying to contact any of his relative in the city of Osaka, his home country Japan through his address with me, to let his people know about his money in our bank but I did not receive any response. I later remembered that Mr. Toshio came to my country out of shame he was receiving from his country because he was impotent. This secret he revealed to me when he was alive because I pestered him to introduce his children to me. Now I have decided to link anybody to stand as Mr. Toshio next of kin in order to claim the money he deposited here as Fixed Solid Investment since nobody knew about it. Government of my country will pay it to Federal Reserve if I should declare to them about this fund. Note that there is no risk involved in this transaction, as I will give you all information you may need about Mr. Toshio and his banking relationship with my branch to enable you stand as his next of kin to receive this money in you'r account. This transaction will go through normal banking process only that you have to stand firm as the next of kin to Mr. Toshio just to claim this money. I will direct you on how to apply for the claims of this money. Please if you are interested and capable to carry out this deal with me, contact me through my email address {mr.adams@seeqmail.com} or { davidadams03@yahoo.com }. I will require the following information from you for procession of the fund in your favour.

1. Your private phone and fax number
2. Your account information where this fund will be paid into.
3. Your home address. I personally need your home address because I do not know you too well before now only that I decided to work with you on trust believing God that you will not cheat on me.! Note that we can conclude this transaction within 2 weeks upon your compliance in applying for the claims to our Head Office, as I will direct you. I will give you 25 percent after we conclude this transaction. Be duly informed that I will be resigning from this banking work to come over to your country after the transfer of this fund to your account. I will then engage myself in international business since I will have enough money for any kind of business after this transaction. You need not to be afraid because in as much as I would want my reputation protected, I would also want yours to also be protected. I 'm waiting for your urgent response.

Best regards,

{ used by luminaries such as "DAVID ADAMS", "NIKOLAS OKAFOR", "MR EZE" ... }

messages.body:
Mr Adams

I have received a very strange message from you. Is this an emergency, and do you really need my assistance? Neither I or my assistant Dick Grayson can decide what to do.


Bruce


Bruce Wayne
Wayne Mansion
Gotham
California 41969
USA
00 1 212 388 0191

messages.subject: THANKS FOR YOUR RESPONSE.
messages.body:
ATTENTION MR BRUCE,

THANKS FOR YOUR MAIL IN RESPECT OF MY PROPOSAL TO YOU.I HAVE DECIDED TO DO
THIS DEAL WITH YOU AND HEREBY ASSURE YOU OF MY SINCERITY AND ZEAL TO GO
AHEAD WITH YOU AND ALSO YOU HAVE TO ASSURE ME OF YOUR HONESTY AND
CONFIDENCIALITY OF THIS BUSINESS.

PLEASE YOU CAN CALL ME ON 234-80-33082526. YOU SHOULD ALSO FURNISH ME WITH
YOUR MOBILE TELEPHONE NUMBER FOR EASIER COMMUNICATION AS YOU CAN ALSO GET
ME 24 HOURS ON MY NUMBER.I WILL SEND YOU A FORM WHICH YOU WILL FILL AND
RETURN BACK TO ME TO ENABLE THIS TRANSACTION START OFF IMMEDIATELY AS I
GURANTEE THE TRANSFER INTO YOUR NORMINATED BANK ACCOUNT.
EXPECTING YOUR URGENT RESPONSE IN THIS REGARD.
I WILL CALL YOU TODAY.
THANKS

MR DAVID ADAMS.

messages.body:
JULY 20

Mr Adams,

Thanks for this. It sounds rather exciting. I'd be very upset if you were some kind of riddler or joker, though. I have a lot of money that I use for good causes and myself and Dick Grayson really hope this is genuine.

Bruce
messages.raw:
BRUCE WAYNE

JULY 20 Mr Adams,

Thanks for this. It sounds rather exciting. I'd be very upset if you were some kind of riddler or joker, though. I have a lot of money that I use for good causes and myself and Dick Grayson really hope this is genuine.

Bruce

messages.body:
Dear Mr. Adams,

I didn't mean to offend you. But you must see it from my point of view. I get all sorts of strange e-mails, and not all of them are honest. But as I read your e-mail I am becoming convinced of your intentions. Please let me know how to proceed.

Bruce
messages.raw:
BRUCE WAYNE

Date: Wed Jul 21, 2004 2:08:20 AM US/Pacific

Dear Mr. Adams,

I didn't mean to offend you. But you must see it from my point of view. I get all sorts of strange e-mails, and not all of them are honest. But as I read your e-mail I am becoming convinced of your intentions. Please let me know how to proceed.

Bruce

[ after a short break from anti-scamming, it's time to toss another pebble at the window... ]

messages.body:
Dear Mr Adams

My apologies for this. Of course I know this is not a joke. Please call me on this number: 1-877-422-4642  and ask to speak to either myself or Robin my PA. If he isnt there then ask for the secretary Penny Guin.

I have tried your number but it does not seem to connect by the way. Please check this as it may be serious.

Bruce

messages.subject: very urgent from mr adams.
messages.body:
Attn: Mr Bruce,

I know  you must be surprise to hear from me since
last two weeks. My mail box has been going through a
technical problem which are yet to be rectify. I try
to reach you on phone to tell you the latest
development in view  of what next to do and how to
conclude this business urgently. And we have to
continue our communication with this yahoo mail
address for easier and security reasons.

Meanwhile I have made arrangement with a reputable
attorney to handle the legal aspect of this
transaction and I will brief you of the development.
Please acknowledge the receipt of this mail so that I
can send you the form to fill and send back to me for
documentation. The transaction at this level could be
achieved under eight banking days. You have to assure
me of your honesty and zeal to conclude this business
with me. Henceforth we should communicate through this
mail address. Why cant you people call me on phone as
I can not get you on phone because the number you gave
to me 212-3880191 is permanently on fax. Feel free to
speak with me any time on 234-8033082526. Please my
brother this is not a joke and have been praying and
fasting for this business to go through without any
problem from your side and God have assured me of the
success and also I advises you people to always put
every thing in prayer because with God all things are
possible.

Expecting your urgent response.

Mr. David Adams

DAVID ADAMS

Why cant you people call me on phone as I can not get you on phone because the number you gave to me 212-3880191 is permanently on fax. Feel free to speak with me any time on 234-8033082526. Please my brother this is not a joke and have been praying and fasting for this business to go through without any problem from your side and God have assured me of the success and also I advises you people to always put every thing in prayer because with God all things are possible.

Expecting your urgent response.

Mr. David Adams

messages.body:
Dear Mr Adams

I am so glad and relieved to hear from you again, after fearing something was wrong. Indeed my fiance Penny Guin was suggesting that you might be something of a joker.

However now we are back talking together let us move this modality forward as soon as possible. I will turn the fax off and expect to hear from you. Please be patient, as this is a busy line. I am expecting an urgent call from Adam West, my tailor concerning a cowl for the evenings, and so will be in just by the receiver to pick it up at once in any case.

I hope you are well.

God help you,

Bruce


PS Is your phone working? I cannot get through.

BRUCE WAYNE

I am so glad and relieved to hear from you again, after fearing something was wrong. Indeed my fiance Penny Guin was suggesting that you might be something of a joker.

I am expecting an urgent call from Adam West, my tailor concerning a cowl for the evenings, and so will be in just by the receiver to pick it up at once in any case.

I hope you are well.

God help you,

Bruce

PS Is your phone working? I cannot get through.

email today unfailingly.

Best regards,

David Adams

Bruce

messages.body:
Dear Mr Adams

Please send the form again as I think my young ward Dick Grayson has been using the computer and has deleted one or two files by mistake. My apologies for the delay in response but I have fighting like a superhero against a terrific workload, which has taken me away from the office for a few days.

I know time is pressing and need to make up for lost time, so Lets get moving like a bat out of hell on this, especially I am very short of funds at present.

BRUCE

Date: 24 Aug 2004, 03:44:01 AM

messages.body:
Holy cow, Mr Adams!

I am not sure that I like this tone of voice, I took you for a serious and honest business man and now you are getting rather rude which is off putting to say the least! Or perhaps this is the work of a joker.

I am sorry that you are elderly and with a pair of rickety grandchildren but this hardly is the point. I am doing my best here and now you insult me. I have to ask myself if it worth continuing, after all it hardly my fault if you have lost the forms. My assistant Penny Guin has been quite certain they were sent.

If you do not apologise for this outburst then it will be so much the worse for the trust we were starting to building. First you are polite, then rude, and so you will excuse me if I say that I am finding you a bit of riddler, sir.

You will excuse me if I am too harsh but I am under some worry today.One of my felines is poorly and I have had to send for the vet. The catwoman is due here soon.

BRUCE
messages.raw:
BRUCE WAYNE

Date: 27 Aug 2004, 07:40:27 AM

Holy cow, Mr Adams!

I am not sure that I like this tone of voice, I took you for a serious and honest business man and now you are getting rather rude which is off putting to say the least! Or perhaps this is the work of a joker.

I am sorry that you are elderly and with a pair of rickety grandchildren but this hardly is the point. I am doing my best here and now you insult me. I have to ask myself if it worth continuing, after all it hardly my fault if you have lost the forms. My assistant Penny Guin has been quite certain they were sent.

If you do not apologise for this outburst then it will be so much the worse for the trust we were starting to building. First you are polite, then rude, and so you will excuse me if I say that I am finding you a bit of riddler, sir.

You will excuse me if I am too harsh but I am under some worry today.One of my felines is poorly and I have had to send for the vet. The catwoman is due here soon.

BRUCE

messages.subject: I AM SORRY.
messages.body:
DEAR MR BRUCE,
THANKS FOR YOUR MESSAGE.YOUR DELAY OF THIS BUSINESS
REALY MAKES ME FEEL VERY UNCOMFORTABLE AND ABOVE ALL
YOU DONT KNOW WHAT I AM GOING THROUGH.
    I THINK I DID NOT INSULT YOU IN ANY FORM BUT IF
YOUFEEL INSULTED IN MY LAST MAIL TO YOU,I SINCERELY
FROM THE BOTTOM OF MY HEARTH APPOLOGISE TO YOU.YOU
SHOULD FORGET AND FORGIVE, SO THAT WE CAN MOVE AHEAD
AND CONCLUDE THIS TRANSACTION.
   I ALSO SENT THE FORM TO YOU WHICH YOU DID NOT MAKE
ANY COMMENT.PLEASE FILL THE FORM AND RETURN IT BACK TO
ME.I ALSO HAVE TO RESEND IT THE THIRD TIME AGAIN.
THANKS AND REMAIN BLESSED.
MR DAVID ADAMS.
messages.raw:
DAVID ADAMS

Subject: I AM SORRY.
Date: Sat, 28 Aug 2004 09:21:13 -0700 (PDT)

DEAR MR BRUCE,
THANKS FOR YOUR MESSAGE.YOUR DELAY OF THIS BUSINESS REALY MAKES ME FEEL VERY UNCOMFORTABLE AND ABOVE ALL YOU DONT KNOW WHAT I AM GOING THROUGH.
I THINK I DID NOT INSULT YOU IN ANY FORM BUT IF YOUFEEL INSULTED IN MY LAST MAIL TO YOU,I SINCERELY FROM THE BOTTOM OF MY HEARTH APPOLOGISE TO YOU.YOU SHOULD FORGET AND FORGIVE, SO THAT WE CAN MOVE AHEAD AND CONCLUDE THIS TRANSACTION.
I ALSO SENT THE FORM TO YOU WHICH YOU DID NOT MAKE ANY COMMENT.PLEASE FILL THE FORM AND RETURN IT BACK TO ME.I ALSO HAVE TO RESEND IT THE THIRD TIME AGAIN.
THANKS AND REMAIN BLESSED.
MR DAVID ADAMS.

messages.subject: REMINDER.
messages.body:
DEAR MR BRUCE,
I AM STILL WAITING FOR THE FORM, AND HIGHLY WORRIED
ABOUT THE DELAY.THERE IS A NEW POLICY ORDER FROM
CENTRAL BANK OF NIGERIA FOR RECAPITALIZATION BY ALL
BANKS IN NIGERIA TO THE TUNE OF 25 BILLION NAIRA WITH
THE CENTRAL BANK OF NIGERIA.
  I DONT WANT THIS NEW POLICY TO HOLDUS BACK AND ABOVE
ALL CENTRAL BANK WILL ALSO NOT ALLOW COMMERCIAL BANK
TO TRANSFER ANY AMOUNT ABOVE ONE MILLION DOLLARS
WITHOUT APPROVAL FROM THE APEX BANK.THIS IS THE NEW
GOVERNMENT POLICY TO CHECK CAPITAL FLIGHT AND FOREIGN
EXCHANGE.THIS NEW POLICY WILL EFFECTIVE VERY SOON,SO
LET ME KNOW YOUR MIND BEFORE IT IS TOO LATE.
BEST REGARDS.
MR DAVID ADAMS.

BEST REGARDS.
MR DAVID ADAMS.

messages.body:
Dear Mr Adams

Have you now received the form? I commissioned my friend Gordon to resend it out from a different number after my fax machine broke. (I have quite an old model the Chief Ohara BM1 - have you heard of it?)

I am concerned that no reply has been received. Are you still interested in the deal? This is not childs play my friend and all the modalities need addressing.

BRUCE
